# cancelUserAttentionRequest(_:)

**Instance Method**

Cancels a previous user attention request.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func cancelUserAttentionRequest(_ request: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **request**: The request identifier returned by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/requestUserAttention(_:)] method.

## Discussion

A request is also canceled automatically by user activation of the app.

## Managing user attention requests

- **requestUserAttention(_:)**: Starts a user attention request.
- **NSApplication.RequestUserAttentionType**: These constants specify the level of severity of a user attention request and are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/cancelUserAttentionRequest(_:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/requestUserAttention(_:)].
- **reply(toOpenOrPrint:)**: Handles errors that might occur when the user attempts to open or print files.
- **NSApplication.DelegateReply**: Constants that indicate whether a copy or print operation was successful, was canceled, or failed.
